original_title: Against Wind and Tide: A Cuban Odyssey
overview: Against Wind and Tide: A Cuban Odyssey is a 1981 American documentary film about the Mariel boatlift, which was first broadcast on PBS the week of June 1, 1981. Written by John Brousek, the film was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Documentary Feature.
title: Against Wind and Tide: A Cuban Odyssey
